__TOC__


Releases to 1.0 will be based on approximate percentage of Free Desktop spec icons completed. Releases after 1.0 will be based on parity with the GNOME set.
<<BR>>
* eg:
** 25% = .25
** 50% = .50
** 75% = .75
** 100% = 1.0 Free Desktop parity
** 200% = 2.0 GNOME parity
